newsitem.title: CANADA: CFM Majestic prices 5.6 mln share issue.
newsitem.headline: CFM Majestic prices 5.6 mln share issue.

text.p: CFM Majestic Inc said on Wednesday it signed an underwriting agreement for the sale of 5.6 million common shares of CFM at C$20.00 per share for gross proceeds of C$112 million.
CFM said the issue includes about 2.5 million shares from treasury and 3.1 million shares from certain selling shareholders.
Proceeds of the sale together with unutilized credit facilities currently in place will be available for CFM's acquisition program.
